phrases: Other than Saturdays, I go almost every day.
What is with that tongue clicking?
An era where only studying is required of children?
This has become a fine country.
I will think about it after I get in touch with my old man.
I will return the tupperware at school.
The harmony is all messed up.
You have lost your sense of direction.
What exactly are you trying to portray?
When your design is slipshod, using eccentric colors is not going to help.
I have already said you are not up to oil painting yet.
Mikuriya, this is still beyond your ability.
What a waste of time, taking out so many painting equipments.
Your palette is full of paint too.
You just want to imitate him, do not you?
The rookie of the Arts Club, Daitetsu-kun has finished his oil painting!
To finish a painting with only a palette knife, that is so cool!
A person with a large-build sure has a bold style!
But there is a calculated beauty even beneath the boldness!
Sense is needed to use pink effectively.
It was somewhat completed, but I broke it by accident.
I am sorry you had to carry the tree for me...
I want to lend you this.
I am trying to work here, so shut up!
Now the focus line I have drawn is off!
I have been here all along.
You were so quiet, I did not notice you.
How is your comic coming along?
Which magazine are you submitting to this time?
Oh, you mean that magazine full of comics that I thought I have seen before.
But this comic sure gives the feeling of What exactly is going on?
The motive of the war is unclear, is not it?
The world-view is influenced by existing works.
Are you some examiner from a comic school?!
Why did you come to the Arts Club anyway?
If you want to draw comics, you should have gone to the Comics Club.
Do not group me with the likes of them!
They talk about anime wherever they go, and they even do not care about their attire!
In any case, from what I have seen from their doujinshi, they are hardly active at all!
So you have no interest in anime and such, right?
No, That is actually a magical girl show that is entirely different from other anime.
Especially in that episode with the collaboration of Director Yajima and Hashida-san,
the quality is comparable to a movie's, and the direction is targeted at adults.
Only that episode is sold well on DVD, the related merchandise is also highly appraised.
Considering the Arts Club tends to have few male members...
our first-year students this year can be called a good harvest.
Do not you think it is a terrific balance?
If this is an RPG, they can form a party and fight a boss!
Takako, which boy do you prefer?
Let us see... it is hard to rule out any of them.
But if I have to choose...
Both Akiba and Daitetsu are amazing.
I cannot create a piece of art on my own.
Jin, you are also trying your best.
I entered the Arts Club because I look up to you.
But someday I will surpass you!
Yeah, as they say, youngsters need a trial.
In the northwest of the school compounds, there is an old building for hobby groups.
The basement there is used as a storehouse for the Arts Club.
It is been deserted for years, so I would like to tidy it up before I step down.
Fortunately, we have male helpers this year.
Old building for hobby groups... you do not mean that one, do you?
Mikuriya, you are afraid of ghosts?
No, it is actually the opposite.
He is really good with ghosts.
I do not want to go!
It is not like I can do anything even if I can see them!
We keep going to temples and such during field trips, right?
It is not fun at all!
It is not fun at all!
Something amazing will happen if you tell him ghost stories.
I never thought we would have this kind of talent.
I have always wanted to ask you something, Jin.
What will happen if a ghost meets a netted door?
This is the first time I am seeing it up close.
I usually will not come here.
I cannot look straight and walk.
Why are you bringing me along?
Anyway, let us go inside first.
Today we will just look around.
If we do not see what is inside, we will not know how many helpers we will need.
I am sorry, I am really sorry.
I do not believe in ghosts.
Alright, let us move those obstructions so that we can carry stuff easily.
Daitetsu, your back is so big.
What did you come here for?
Look, this is just a musty storehouse.
The ghost thing is just a rumor.
There is even a storage under the floor.
This will take more work than expected.
I heard this from Senpai just now...
It is true that there was an accident here.
A student fell down from a ladder and died.
There happened to be a sharp pole right below.
He was impaled, but he remained conscious for a short while.
He cried for help, but nobody came.
Around him, a sea of blood.
In the meantime, he bled until he lost all his strength...
But that student has not realized that he is dead...
Even now, you can still hear him calling for help...
You see, there is no ladder around here!
So, have you tidied up the place?
But I am telling the truth!
You should find the because of that.
Let us look at this shop's specialty: the crab ice-cream!
Its sale is limited to fifty per day, so it will be sold out in a jiffy!
I want to go to the school too!
This worry has nothing to do with you at all.
I tried doing it one more time, but it still stinks.
Can I hold an impurity in my hand and bring it home?
How about putting it in a bottle...
But I still cannot be sure it was caused by an impurity...
My emotions got the better of me.
What kind of monster are you?
You are not satisfied with a pretty childhood friend?
If this world is a comic, you are the main character.
Shall I carry your bag for you?
Thanks, but it is all right.
That side is the courtyard, and if you go this way, there is a stadium.
This is such a lively place.
Do we have such a beauty in our school?
Is not she a transfer student?
Is not he the guy that Nagi-san was looking for?
In any case, your character is gross, so stop it.
He has two ahoge, so he is an idiot.
Excuse me, but I am her relative.
It is not like what you are thinking.
Tell me, what do you mean I am gross?
Why the hell did you come to school?!
Why? , you have the cheek to ask.
I know you are hiding something from me.
I heard from Tsugumi that there is a commotion concerning ghosts.
you saw an impurity, did not you?
I sense the presence of an impurity here.
They appear easily at a place with many people.
Nagi-san, I told you not to wander around on your own!
I am sorry, I am a curious person.
It would be troublesome if people find out you are an outsider.
You already stand out without doing anything.
Tsugumi, are you the one who brought her along?
Because when I was going home...
I found Nagi-san clinging onto the school gates.
Nagi-san told me she always had a private tutor,
so she has never gone to school bofore.
I will not stand out if I enter the school in school uniform, right?
So we went home and I lent her a set of uniform.
Our school is a private school, so the uniforms are expensive.
That is because girls are concerned about uniforms.
I cannot tell him that I got fatter during the spring break and the size does not fit anymore, so I bought another set!
On top of that, that size fits Nagi-san perfectly!
I cannot bring myself to say it!
Tsugumi-san is such a gentle and kind person!
You are more easygoing than I thought.
I do not think you should call her easygoing.
Are you done with the talking?
This girl is my half-sibling, born from a different mother.
She ran away from home and now she is staying at my house.
There is something I would like to ask you.
Even though Jin and you are siblings, you had not met each other until recently, right?
You have both reached that age, anyway.
Living under the same roof would mean...
How do you feel about that?
No, I just think you are so cute.
Jin-kun is just a child to me.
We live together, that is all.
That is why there is nothing for you to be worried about.
That is not what I meant...
There is no way we can be in a relationship.
You are an important person to Jin-kun.
I have somebody that I like.
Who would have thought you have such a complex situation in your family.
But do not worry about it, Mikuriya.
This kind of situation turns up often in comics!
But you are not a student, and you are a girl, right?
You do not have to go to a place with ghosts...
I do have some exorcism skills myself.
I knew it, living in an enclosed environment makes one twisted.
There are precedents of wealthy girls with a fetish for the supernatural.
You are talking about a girl game?!
She put her purification staff in there.
You took that from my drawer without asking!
I told you not to open my drawers without my permission!
As long as you think nothing of it...
Yeah, I thought nothing of it.
Although I did think that you like big boobs.
But I heard this is natural for a healthy male,
so you do not need to feel bothered-
I am sorry, even I cannot give you a proper answer.
Is not that stick from the anime series that got scrapped in the planning stage,
and only its goods are sold by the sponsor's toy company?
There is a craze over it and they are sold over the net at high prices.
If there is an impurity here, then...
No, let us go back instead!
I feel bad for the ghosts!
I have reached the limit of my endurance.
Daitetsu-kun has gone mad from fear and he is crushing Jin!
You people are humans, are not you?
You have a future, you are the best,
there is no reason for you to lose to creatures that move because they are bound to their past!
She has taken on that personality.
The living is stronger than the dead!
It seems we have agitated it.
It is certainly calling for help.
He was in such a dark place, hurting and afraid.
And yet nobody could find him.
He cannot open that door for sure.
Because he was caught in the maze of dying without being able to open the door.
This door is poorly built, really.
I should tell the school janitor to fix it.
If we do not do this, I do not feel like we are welcoming the new members at all.
This sort of thing happens often in sport clubs, right?
This is what they call a baptism.
This is our Arts Club's advisor, Dokusasori-sensei.
He is using the place under the floor as his studio.
You guys do not learn your lesson, doing this every year.
Well, I do not mind since I enjoy it.
Perhaps I should have taped it on video.
There are lots of them here, big ones.
That cannot be, That cannot be!
I am sure I sensed an impurity!
You fail the test if it comes with a time limit though.
You were searching in such a wrong place.
Without that toy, you cannot clean up on your own?
Please watch the next episode of Kannagi too!
